question.string: Which groups were founded in 1924?
Who produced the album Dookie?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?producer ?name WHERE { ?album mo:release_type mo:album . ?album dc:title ?title . ?album mo:producer ?producer . ?producer foaf:name ?name . FILTER regex(str(?title),'Dookie') }

question.string: Which artists were born in July 1904?
Give me all artists who contributed to more than three collaborations.
question.query: PREFIX bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rel: <http://purl.org/vocab/relationship/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT ?artist ?name WHERE { ?artist rdf:type mo:SoloMusicArtist . ?artist foaf:name ?name . ?artist rel:collaboratesWith ?collaboration . } GROUP BY ?artist ?name HAVING (COUNT(?collaboration) > 3)

question.string: How many tracks does La Isla Bonita have?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ?track) as ?number WHERE { ?track rdf:type mo:Track . ?track dc:title ?title . FILTER regex(str(?title),'La Isla Bonita') }

question.string: Who composed The Heroes of Telemark?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?composer ?name WHERE { ?album mo:release_type mo:soundtrack . ?album dc:title 'The Heroes of Telemark' . ?album mo:composer ?composer . ?composer foaf:name ?name. }

question.string: Which artists turn 50 on May 28, 2012?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist ?artistname WHERE { ?artist rdf:type mo:MusicArtist . ?artist foaf:name ?artistname . ?artist bio:event ?event . ?event rdf:type bio:Birth . ?event bio:date '1962-05-28'^^xsd:date . }

question.string: Is Bugs a track on the album Vitalogy?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> ASK WHERE { ?album dc:title 'Vitalogy' . ?album mo:track ?track . ?track dc:title 'Bugs' }

question.string: Who sang on the album Home Free?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?singer ?name WHERE { ?album mo:release_type mo:album . ?album dc:title 'Home Free' . ?album mo:singer ?singer . ?singer foaf:name ?name }

question.string: Who made the lyrics of the song Mambo No. 5?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?lyricist ?name WHERE { ?single mo:release_type mo:single . ?single dc:title 'Mambo No. 5' . ?single mo:lyricist ?lyricist . ?lyricist foaf:name ?name }

question.string: How long is Louder Than Words by Against All Authority?
question.keywords: long, Louder Than Words, Against All Authority
question.query: PREFIX bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX tl: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/timeline.owl#> SELECT ?time WHERE { ?album mo:release_type mo:album . ?album mo:track ?track . ?track dc:title 'Louder Than Words' . ?track foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name 'Against All Authority' . ?track tl:duration ?time . }

question.string: Give me all albums which have the name of their artist as title.
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?album ?title WHERE { ?album mo:release_type mo:album . ?album dc:title ?title . ?album foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name ?name . FILTER (?title = ?name) }

question.string: Was the album Coming Home created by Lionel Richie?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> ASK WHERE { ?album dc:title 'Coming Home' . ?album foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name 'Lionel Richie' . }

question.string: How many singles did the Scorpions produce?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ?single) WHERE { ?single mo:release_type mo:single . ?single foaf:maker ?artist . ?artist foaf:name 'Scorpions' }

question.string: Who composed the song Coast To Coast?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?maker ?name WHERE { ?track rdf:type mo:Track . ?track dc:title 'Coast to Coast' . ?track foaf:maker ?maker . ?maker foaf:name ?name }

question.string: Which bands broke up in 2000?
question.query: PREFIX bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist ?name WHERE { ?artist rdf:type mo:MusicGroup . ?artist foaf:name ?name . ?artist bio:event ?event . ?event rdf:type bio:Death . { ?event bio:date ?date . FILTER ( ?date <= '2000-12-31'^^xsd:date && ?date >= '2000-01-01'^^xsd:date ) } UNION { ?event bio:date ?date . FILTER regex (?date,'2000') } }

question.string: Which artist created Last Christmas?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist ?name WHERE { ?track dc:title 'Last Christmas' . ?artist rdf:type mo:MusicArtist . ?artist foaf:name ?name . ?track foaf:maker ?artist }

question.string: Which artist made the albums Blackout and Circus?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?maker1 ?name1 WHERE { ?album1 dc:title 'Blackout' . ?album2 dc:title 'Circus' . ?album1 foaf:maker ?maker1 . ?album2 foaf:maker ?maker2 . ?maker1 foaf:name ?name1 . ?maker2 foaf:name ?name2 . FILTER (regex(?name1, ?name2)) }

question.string: With whom did Phil Collins work together?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX rel: <http://purl.org/vocab/relationship/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist2 ?name WHERE { ?artist foaf:name 'Phil Collins' . ?artist rel:collaboratesWith ?collaboration . ?artist2 foaf:name ?name . ?artist2 rel:collaboratesWith ?collaboration . }

question.string: Give me all bands whose name starts with Play.
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist ?name WHERE { ?artist rdf:type mo:MusicGroup . ?artist foaf:name ?name . FILTER (regex(?name, '^Play')) }

question.string: How many singles did Peter Gabriel make?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(?single) as ?number WHERE { ?single mo:release_type mo:single . ?single foaf:maker ?maker . ?maker foaf:name 'Peter Gabriel' . }

question.string: To how many persons has Madonna been married?
Who was born on the same day as Tina Turner?
question.query: PREFIX bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist ?name WHERE { ?tina rdf:type mo:SoloMusicArtist . ?tina foaf:name 'Tina Turner' . ?tina bio:event ?tinaevent . ?tinaevent rdf:type bio:Birth . ?tinaevent bio:date ?tinadate . ?artist rdf:type mo:SoloMusicArtist . ?artist foaf:name ?name . ?artist bio:event ?event . ?event rdf:type bio:Birth . ?event bio:date ?date . FILTER (?tinadate = ?date) . FILTER (?name != 'Tina Turner') }

question.string: Which compilations does the song Last Christmas appear on?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX tl: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/timeline.owl#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?compilation ?title WHERE { ?track rdf:type mo:Track . ?track dc:title 'Last Christmas' . ?compilation mo:track ?track . ?compilation mo:release_type mo:compilation . ?compilation dc:title ?title }

question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX tl: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/timeline.owl#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT ?time WHERE { ?track rdf:type mo:Track . ?track dc:title 'Last Christmas' . ?track foaf:maker ?maker . ?maker foaf:name 'Kate & Bob' . ?track tl:duration ?time }

question.string: Who made more than 30 albums?
question.query: PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?maker ?name WHERE { ?album mo:release_type mo:album . ?album foaf:maker ?maker . ?maker foaf:name ?name . } GROUP BY ?maker ?name HAVING (COUNT(?name) > 30)

question.string: Who was the husband of Whitney Houston?

question.string: Give me the death date of Ludwig van Beethoven.
question.query: PREFIX bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT ?death WHERE { ?artist rdf:type mo:SoloMusicArtist . ?artist foaf:name 'Ludwig van Beethoven' . ?artist bio:event ?eventDeath . ?eventDeath rdf:type bio:Death . ?eventDeath bio:date ?death . }

question.string: How many pieces of work did Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart create?
question.keywords: piece of work, Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, create
question.query: PREFIX bio: <http://purl.org/vocab/bio/0.1/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ?title) WHERE { ?artist rdf:type mo:SoloMusicArtist . ?artist foaf:name 'Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart' . ?composition foaf:maker ?artist . ?composition dc:title ?title . }

question.string: When were the Dixie Chicks founded?

question.string: How many children did Bob Marley have?

question.string: Which albums of Elvis Presley have Elvis in their title?

FILTER (regex(?title, 'Elvis')) }

question.string: How many live albums by Elvis Presley are there?
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ?live) WHERE { ?live mo:release_type mo:live . ?live dc:title ?title . ?live foaf:maker ?maker . ?maker foaf:name 'Elvis Presley' . }

question.string: Which member of the Beatles has more than one children?
question.keywords: member, Beatles, more than two, child
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX rel: <http://purl.org/vocab/relationship/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist ?name WHERE { ?band foaf:name 'The Beatles' . ?artist mo:member_of ?band . ?artist rel:parentOf ?child . ?artist foaf:name ?name . } GROUP BY ?artist ?name HAVING (COUNT(?child) > 1)

FILTER (regex(?date, '-03-')) }

question.string: Which member of Take That recorded the most albums?
question.keywords: member, Take That, the most, album
question.query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist ?name WHERE { ?band foaf:name 'Take That' . ?artist mo:member_of ?band . ?artist foaf:name ?name . ?record foaf:maker ?artist . ?record rdf:type mo:Record . } ORDER BY DESC(COUNT(?record)) LIMIT 1
